summary: Y-Store Marketplace comprehensive testing completed. Backend APIs working well (87.5% success rate), frontend loads correctly with Layout Core v2 catalog, filters, and admin access functional.

minor_bugs.impact: Search suggestions may not work for empty/initial queries

ui_bugs.issue: Search suggestions dropdown not appearing when typing Samsung

passed_tests: Catalog page loads with Layout Core v2 (sidebar + grid)
Filters sidebar shows price, brand, stock, rating filters
Samsung search returns 6 products via API
Admin login works with admin@ystore.com / Admin123!
Search navigation works (redirects to search results)
Product grid displays multiple products (Samsung, Apple, DJI, etc.)

success_percentage.frontend: 85% (Most functionality working, search suggestions needs fix)

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix search suggestions dropdown not appearing on frontend when typing. The SearchInput component should show dropdown with Samsung suggestions but currently doesn't display the dropdown UI.
